title: Edge of Leningrad
description: Itâ€™s 1941, the coldest winter in Russian history. The German army has been trying to invade Leningrad for five months. Half the city has already died from the cold, starvation or the nightly bombardments. In the devastation, three prostitutes, Zoya, Liza, and Alyesia struggle to survive the impending German invasion and the daily hazards of their profession.Thrown together by chance, they accept that this is what has to offer until their exploits begin to catch up with them. Over the course of a few days, a strange series of events will decide who can survive the turmoil of war and brutality.
author: F.S. Williams
